document.full_text: a small study in england found that non-smokers and light smokers paid more attention to health warnings on cigarette packs that lacked branding graphics than on packs that included brand logos.
document.title: plain cigarette packaging highlights warnings
lines_and_colors: a small study in england found that non-smokers and light smokers paid more attention to health warnings on cigarette packs that lacked branding graphics than on packs that included brand logos.
